definitions.example: The new building proposals in the village are arousing unneeded discomfort.
I can't keep my eyes off the dancer; she arouses me greatly.

definitions.definition: To wake from sleep or stupor.
definitions.example: 1996, Beruga (line translated by Dan Owsen), Terranigma. Nintendo of America.

definitions.definition: An act or occurrence in which something is aroused

definitions.example: I am having very arousing thoughts.
